verses.verse: שִׁמְע֥וּ <WH8085> Hearken אֵלַ֛י <WH413> to me רֹ֥דְפֵי <WH7291> to me ye that follow after צֶ֖דֶק <WH6664> righteousness מְבַקְשֵׁ֣י <WH1245> ye that seek יְהוָ֑ה <WH3068> the LORD הַבִּ֙יטוּ֙ <WH5027> look אֶל־ <WH413> to צ֣וּר <WH6697> unto the rock חֻצַּבְתֶּ֔ם <WH2672> [whence] ye are hewn וְאֶל־ <WH413> and to מַקֶּ֥בֶת <WH4718> and to the hole בּ֖וֹר <WH953> of the pit נֻקַּרְתֶּֽם׃ <WH5365> [whence] ye are digged

הַבִּ֙יטוּ֙ <WH5027> Look אֶל־ <WH413> to אַבְרָהָ֣ם <WH85> unto Abraham אֲבִיכֶ֔ם <WH1> your father וְאֶל־ <WH413> and to שָׂרָ֖ה <WH8283> and unto Sarah תְּחוֹלֶלְכֶ֑ם <WH2342> [that] bare כִּי־ <WH3588> When אֶחָ֣ד <WH259> him alone קְרָאתִ֔יו <WH7121> you for I called וַאֲבָרְכֵ֖הוּ <WH1288> and blessed וְאַרְבֵּֽהוּ׃ <WH7235> him and increased ס

כִּֽי־ <WH3588> Indeed נִחַ֨ם <WH5162> shall comfort יְהוָ֜ה <WH3068> For the LORD צִיּ֗וֹן <WH6726> Zion נִחַם֙ <WH5162> he will comfort כָּל־ <WH3605> all חָרְבֹתֶ֔יהָ <WH2723> all her waste places וַיָּ֤שֶׂם <WH7760> and he will make מִדְבָּרָהּ֙ <WH4057> her wilderness כְּעֵ֔דֶן <WH5731> like Eden וְעַרְבָתָ֖הּ <WH6160> and her desert כְּגַן־ <WH1588> like the garden יְהוָ֑ה <WH3068> of the LORD שָׂשׂ֤וֹן <WH8342> joy וְשִׂמְחָה֙ <WH8057> and gladness יִמָּ֣צֵא <WH4672> shall be found בָ֔הּ תּוֹדָ֖ה <WH8426> therein thanksgiving וְק֥וֹל <WH6963> and the voice זִמְרָֽה׃ <WH2172> of melody ס

הַקְשִׁ֤יבוּ <WH7181> Hearken אֵלַי֙ <WH413> to me עַמִּ֔י <WH5971> unto me my people וּלְאוּמִּ֖י <WH3816> unto me O my nation אֵלַ֣י <WH413> and הַאֲזִ֑ינוּ <WH238> and give ear כִּ֤י <WH3588> For תוֹרָה֙ <WH8451> for a law מֵאִתִּ֣י <WH853> תֵצֵ֔א <WH3318> shall proceed וּמִשְׁפָּטִ֔י <WH4941> from me and I will make my judgment לְא֥וֹר <WH216> for a light עַמִּ֖ים <WH5971> of the people אַרְגִּֽיעַ׃ <WH7280> to rest

קָר֤וֹב <WH7138> [is] near צִדְקִי֙ <WH6664> My righteousness יָצָ֣א <WH3318> is gone forth יִשְׁעִ֔י <WH3468> my salvation וּזְרֹעַ֖י <WH2220> and mine arms עַמִּ֣ים <WH5971> the people יִשְׁפֹּ֑טוּ <WH8199> shall judge אֵלַי֙ <WH413> about אִיִּ֣ים <WH339> the isles יְקַוּ֔וּ <WH6960> shall wait וְאֶל־ <WH413> about זְרֹעִ֖י <WH2220> upon me and on mine arm יְיַחֵלֽוּן׃ <WH3176> shall they trust

שְׂאוּ֩ <WH5375> Lift up לַשָּׁמַ֨יִם <WH8064> to the heavens עֵֽינֵיכֶ֜ם <WH5869> your eyes וְֽהַבִּ֧יטוּ <WH5027> and look אֶל־ <WH413> to הָאָ֣רֶץ <WH776> upon the earth מִתַּ֗חַת <WH8478> Thahash כִּֽי־ <WH3588> For שָׁמַ֜יִם <WH8064> beneath for the heavens כֶּעָשָׁ֤ן <WH6227> like smoke נִמְלָ֙חוּ֙ <WH4414> shall vanish away וְהָאָ֙רֶץ֙ <WH776> and the earth כַּבֶּ֣גֶד <WH899> like a garment תִּבְלֶ֔ה <WH1086> shall wax old וְיֹשְׁבֶ֖יהָ <WH3427> and they that dwell כְּמוֹ־ <WH3644> in like כֵ֣ן <WH3651> after that יְמוּת֑וּן <WH4191> therein shall die וִישֽׁוּעָתִי֙ <WH3444> but my salvation לְעוֹלָ֣ם <WH5769> shall be for ever תִּֽהְיֶ֔ה <WH1961> become וְצִדְקָתִ֖י <WH6666> and my righteousness לֹ֥א <WH3808> will not תֵחָֽת׃ <WH2865> shall not be abolished ס

שִׁמְע֤וּ <WH8085> Hearken אֵלַי֙ <WH413> to me יֹ֣דְעֵי <WH3045> unto me ye that know צֶ֔דֶק <WH6664> righteousness עַ֖ם <WH5971> the people תּוֹרָתִ֣י <WH8451> [is] my law בְלִבָּ֑ם <WH3820> in whose heart אַל־ <WH408> Nor תִּֽירְאוּ֙ <WH3372> fear חֶרְפַּ֣ת <WH2781> ye not the reproach אֱנ֔וֹשׁ <WH582> of men וּמִגִּדֻּפֹתָ֖ם <WH1421> of their revilings אַל־ <WH408> Nor תֵּחָֽתּוּ׃ <WH2865> neither be ye afraid

כִּ֤י <WH3588> like כַבֶּ֙גֶד֙ <WH899> like a garment יֹאכְלֵ֣ם <WH398> shall eat them up עָ֔שׁ <WH6211> For the moth וְכַצֶּ֖מֶר <WH6785> them like wool יֹאכְלֵ֣ם <WH398> shall eat סָ֑ס <WH5580> and the worm וְצִדְקָתִי֙ <WH6666> but my righteousness לְעוֹלָ֣ם <WH5769> shall be for ever תִּֽהְיֶ֔ה <WH1961> become וִישׁוּעָתִ֖י <WH3444> and my salvation לְד֥וֹר <WH1755> from generation דּוֹרִֽים׃ <WH1755> to generation ס

עוּרִ֨י <WH5782> Awake עוּרִ֤י <WH5782> awake לִבְשִׁי־ <WH3847> put on עֹז֙ <WH5797> strength זְר֣וֹעַ <WH2220> O arm יְהוָ֔ה <WH3069> God ע֚וּרִי <WH5782> awake כִּ֣ימֵי <WH3117> days קֶ֔דֶם <WH6924> as in the ancient דֹּר֖וֹת <WH1755> in the generations עוֹלָמִ֑ים <WH5769> of old הֲל֥וֹא <WH3808> not אַתְּ־ <WH859> you הִ֛יא <WH1931> who הַמַּחְצֶ֥בֶת <WH2672> [Art] thou not it that hath cut רַ֖הַב <WH7294> Rahab מְחוֹלֶ֥לֶת <WH2490> [and] wounded תַּנִּֽין׃ <WH8577> dragon

הֲל֤וֹא <WH3808> not אַתְּ־ <WH859> you הִיא֙ <WH1931> who הַמַּחֲרֶ֣בֶת <WH2717> [Art] thou not it which hath dried יָ֔ם <WH3220> the sea מֵ֖י <WH4325> the waters תְּה֣וֹם <WH8415> deep רַבָּ֑ה <WH7227> of the great הַשָּׂ֙מָה֙ <WH7760> that hath made מַֽעֲמַקֵּי־ <WH4615> the depths יָ֔ם <WH3220> of the sea דֶּ֖רֶךְ <WH1870> a way לַעֲבֹ֥ר <WH5674> to pass over גְּאוּלִֽים׃ <WH1350> for the ransomed

וּפְדוּיֵ֨י <WH6299> Therefore the redeemed יְהוָ֜ה <WH3068> of the LORD יְשׁוּב֗וּן <WH7725> shall return וּבָ֤אוּ <WH935> and come צִיּוֹן֙ <WH6726> unto Zion בְּרִנָּ֔ה <WH7440> with singing וְשִׂמְחַ֥ת <WH8057> joy עוֹלָ֖ם <WH5769> and everlasting עַל־ <WH5921> on רֹאשָׁ֑ם <WH7218> [shall be] upon their head שָׂשׂ֤וֹן <WH8342> gladness וְשִׂמְחָה֙ <WH8057> and joy יַשִּׂיג֔וּן <WH5381> they shall obtain נָ֖סוּ <WH5127> shall flee away יָג֥וֹן <WH3015> [and] sorrow וַאֲנָחָֽה׃ <WH585> and mourning ס

אָנֹכִ֧י <WH595> I אָנֹכִ֛י <WH595> I ה֖וּא <WH1931> who מְנַחֶמְכֶ֑ם <WH5162> I [even] I [am] he that comforteth מִֽי־ <WH4310> Who אַ֤תְּ <WH859> you וַתִּֽירְאִי֙ <WH3372> you who [art] thou that thou shouldest be afraid מֵאֱנ֣וֹשׁ <WH582> of a man יָמ֔וּת <WH4191> [that] shall die וּמִבֶּן־ <WH1121> and of the son אָדָ֖ם <WH120> of man חָצִ֥יר <WH2682> [as] grass יִנָּתֵֽן׃ <WH5414> [which] shall be made

וַתִּשְׁכַּ֞ח <WH7911> And forgettest יְהוָ֣ה <WH3068> the LORD עֹשֶׂ֗ךָ <WH6213> thy maker נוֹטֶ֣ה <WH5186> that hath stretched forth שָׁמַיִם֮ <WH8064> the heavens וְיֹסֵ֣ד <WH3245> and laid the foundations אָרֶץ֒ <WH776> of the earth וַתְּפַחֵ֨ד <WH6342> and hast feared תָּמִ֜יד <WH8548> continually כָּל־ <WH3605> all הַיּ֗וֹם <WH3117> every day מִפְּנֵי֙ <WH6440> because חֲמַ֣ת <WH2534> of the fury הַמֵּצִ֔יק <WH6693> of the oppressor כַּאֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> as if כּוֹנֵ֖ן <WH3559> he were ready לְהַשְׁחִ֑ית <WH7843> to destroy וְאַיֵּ֖ה <WH346> where חֲמַ֥ת <WH2534> ? and where [is] the fury הַמֵּצִֽיק׃ <WH6693> of the oppressor

מִהַ֥ר <WH4116> hasteneth צֹעֶ֖ה <WH6808> The captive exile לְהִפָּתֵ֑חַ <WH6605> that he may be loosed וְלֹא־ <WH3808> nor יָמ֣וּת <WH4191> and that he should not die לַשַּׁ֔חַת <WH7845> in the pit וְלֹ֥א <WH3808> nor יֶחְסַ֖ר <WH2637> should fail לַחְמֽוֹ׃ <WH3899> nor that his bread

וְאָֽנֹכִי֙ <WH595> I יְהוָ֣ה <WH3068> But I [am] the LORD אֱלֹהֶ֔יךָ <WH430> thy God רֹגַ֣ע <WH7280> that divided הַיָּ֔ם <WH3220> the sea וַיֶּהֱמ֖וּ <WH1993> roared גַּלָּ֑יו <WH1530> whose waves יְהוָ֥ה <WH3068> The LORD צְבָא֖וֹת <WH6635> of hosts שְׁמֽוֹ׃ <WH8034> [is] his name

וָאָשִׂ֤ים <WH7760> And I have put דְּבָרַי֙ <WH1697> my words בְּפִ֔יךָ <WH6310> in thy mouth וּבְצֵ֥ל <WH6738> thee in the shadow יָדִ֖י <WH3027> of mine hand כִּסִּיתִ֑יךָ <WH3680> and I have covered לִנְטֹ֤עַ <WH5193> that I may plant שָׁמַ֙יִם֙ <WH8064> the heavens וְלִיסֹ֣ד <WH3245> and lay the foundations אָ֔רֶץ <WH776> of the earth וְלֵאמֹ֥ר <WH559> and say לְצִיּ֖וֹן <WH6726> unto Zion עַמִּי־ <WH5971> Thou [art] my people אָֽתָּה׃ <WH859> you ס

הִתְעוֹרְרִ֣י <WH5782> Awake הִֽתְעוֹרְרִ֗י <WH5782> awake ק֚וּמִי <WH6965> stand up יְר֣וּשָׁלִַ֔ם <WH3389> O Jerusalem אֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> who שָׁתִ֛ית <WH8354> which hast drunk מִיַּ֥ד <WH3027> at the hand יְהוָ֖ה <WH3068> of the LORD אֶת־ <WH853> כּ֣וֹס <WH3563> the cup חֲמָת֑וֹ <WH2534> of his fury אֶת־ <WH853> קֻבַּ֜עַת <WH6907> the dregs כּ֧וֹס <WH3563> of the cup הַתַּרְעֵלָ֛ה <WH8653> of trembling שָׁתִ֖ית <WH8354> thou hast drunken מָצִֽית׃ <WH4680> [and] wrung [them] out

אֵין־ <WH369> There מְנַהֵ֣ל <WH5095> [There is] none to guide לָ֔הּ מִכָּל־ <WH3605> all בָּנִ֖ים <WH1121> her among all the sons יָלָ֑דָה <WH3205> [whom] she hath brought forth וְאֵ֤ין <WH369> is none מַחֲזִיק֙ <WH2388> neither [is there any] that taketh בְּיָדָ֔הּ <WH3027> her by the hand מִכָּל־ <WH3605> all בָּנִ֖ים <WH1121> of all the sons גִּדֵּֽלָה׃ <WH1431> [that] she hath brought up

שְׁתַּ֤יִם <WH8147> These two הֵ֙נָּה֙ <WH2007> These קֹֽרְאֹתַ֔יִךְ <WH7122> [things] are come מִ֖י <WH4310> Who יָנ֣וּד <WH5110> unto thee who shall be sorry לָ֑ךְ הַשֹּׁ֧ד <WH7701> for thee? desolation וְהַשֶּׁ֛בֶר <WH7667> and destruction וְהָרָעָ֥ב <WH7458> and the famine וְהַחֶ֖רֶב <WH2719> and the sword מִ֥י <WH4310> How אֲנַחֲמֵֽךְ׃ <WH5162> by whom shall I comfort

בָּנַ֜יִךְ <WH1121> Thy sons עֻלְּפ֥וּ <WH5968> have fainted שָׁכְב֛וּ <WH7901> they lie בְּרֹ֥אשׁ <WH7218> at the head כָּל־ <WH3605> of every חוּצ֖וֹת <WH2351> of all the streets כְּת֣וֹא <WH8377> as a wild bull מִכְמָ֑ר <WH4364> in a net הַֽמְלֵאִ֥ים <WH4390> accomplish חֲמַת־ <WH2534> of the fury יְהוָ֖ה <WH3068> of the LORD גַּעֲרַ֥ת <WH1606> the rebuke אֱלֹהָֽיִךְ׃ <WH430> of thy God

לָכֵ֛ן <WH3651> Therefore שִׁמְעִי־ <WH8085> Therefore hear נָ֥א <WH4994> please זֹ֖את <WH2063> you עֲנִיָּ֑ה <WH6041> now this thou afflicted וּשְׁכֻרַ֖ת <WH7937> and drunken וְלֹ֥א <WH3808> not מִיָּֽיִן׃ <WH3196> but not with wine ס

כֹּֽה־ <WH3541> Thus אָמַ֞ר <WH559> Thus saith אֲדֹנַ֣יִךְ <WH136> your Lord יְהוָ֗ה <WH3068> the LORD וֵאלֹהַ֙יִךְ֙ <WH430> and thy God יָרִ֣יב <WH7378> [that] pleadeth עַמּ֔וֹ <WH5971> the cause of his people הִנֵּ֥ה <WH2009> Behold לָקַ֛חְתִּי <WH3947> Behold I have taken out מִיָּדֵ֖ךְ <WH3027> of thine hand אֶת־ <WH853> כּ֣וֹס <WH3563> the cup הַתַּרְעֵלָ֑ה <WH8653> of trembling אֶת־ <WH853> קֻבַּ֙עַת֙ <WH6907> [even] the dregs כּ֣וֹס <WH3563> of the cup חֲמָתִ֔י <WH2534> of my fury לֹא־ <WH3808> will never תוֹסִ֥יפִי <WH3254> thou shalt no more לִשְׁתּוֹתָ֖הּ <WH8354> drink it again עֽוֹד׃ <WH5750> again

וְשַׂמְתִּ֙יהָ֙ <WH7760> But I will put בְּיַד־ <WH3027> it into the hand מוֹגַ֔יִךְ <WH3013> of them that afflict אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> Who אָמְר֥וּ <WH559> thee which have said לְנַפְשֵׁ֖ךְ <WH5315> to thy soul שְׁחִ֣י <WH7812> Bow down וְנַעֲבֹ֑רָה <WH5674> that we may go over וַתָּשִׂ֤ימִי <WH7760> and thou hast laid כָאָ֙רֶץ֙ <WH776> as the ground גֵּוֵ֔ךְ <WH1460> thy body וְכַח֖וּץ <WH2351> and as the street לַעֹבְרִֽים׃ <WH5674> to them that went over ס
